title: Zz'rot Portal

embed.description: Following the surge of preseason info that has went out, and Riot Reinboom are here with a look at the preseason's experimental objective and item changes! Continue reading for more information! Before we give in to today's discussion, be sure to catch up on the earlier preseason news: Here's and Riot Reinboom with the full details: "Hi there!

body: Can a red fill us in on why this item was not included? It looked like a really cool item.

replies.body:
It's art intensive. It's still being worked on and explored. :) 

To give a more fulfilling update:
The item required two character models added to the game. One for the gate, and one for the spawn. There's quite a bit of work that goes into things like this to make sure it's cohesive, it makes sense in the gameplay world, it reads well, and so on.

There's also some more gameplay impact that needs to be worked out.
I think it was scrapped and seen as too powerful of an item when built on tanky junglers and split-pushers.
